member.name: IXAudio2EngineCallback.OnCriticalError
member.summary: Called if a critical system error occurs that requires XAudio2 to be closed down and restarted.

member.name: IXAudio2EngineCallback.OnProcessingPassEnd
member.summary: Called by XAudio2 just after an audio processing pass ends.

member.name: IXAudio2EngineCallback.OnProcessingPassStart
member.summary: Called by XAudio2 just before an audio processing pass begins.
